article: Once upon time, a man taught some monkeys how to dance. The monkeys were  _  clever that they began to dance well very soon. The man was happy. He  _  the monkeys up in special clothes and masks . Then he took them to  _  party. He wanted people  to admire  his dancing monkeys. The dancing monkeys were very popular at the party.  _  knew they were monkeys, and everyone enjoyed  Watching  them dance. Then a naughty boy threw some bananas in front of the dancing monkeys.  _  the sight of the bananas,the monkeys forgot all about  dancing  . They tore off  _  masks and rushed over to the bananas and began to eat. All the people at the party began to laugh. "They aren't dancers at all," said one person. "They are just monkeys! I guess not everything you see is  _  it appe- ars to be!" "And," said another, "you should never try to be something you're not."
